summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5096 for the improvement of 26th Avenue South, from Hudson Street to Dawson Street by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58597, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
